trans-unit.source: Field setup aborted because no field was selected!
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType FieldSetupCanceled
trans-unit.target: Veld instellen afgebroken, omdat er geen veld is geselecteerd!

trans-unit.source: The field "%1" is now linked to field "%2"!
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType FieldIsLinkedToSourceField
trans-unit.target: Het veld "%1" is nu gekoppeld aan het veld "%2"!

trans-unit.source: The value for source field %1 in line %2 is missing! Please train this value first!
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType MissingSourceFieldValue
trans-unit.target: De waarde voor het bronveld %1 in lijn %2 ontbreekt! train eerst deze waarde!

trans-unit.source: The value for for %1 (%2) in row %3 is missing! Please train this value first!
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType MissingFieldExampleValue
trans-unit.target: De waarde voor %1 (%2) in rij %3 ontbreekt! train eerst deze waarde!

trans-unit.source: Please select first the source field on the basis of which position the value should be found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType SelectOffsetSourceFieldFirst
trans-unit.target: Selecteer eerst het bronveld op basis van welke positie de waarde moet worden gevonden.

trans-unit.source: Codeunit %1 does not exist! Has the object been renamed?
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType CodeunitDoesNotExist
trans-unit.target: Codeunit %1 bestaat niet! Is het object hernoemd?

trans-unit.source: Error! For the field %1 hasn|t been trained a caption! Please train the caption first.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType TrainCaptionFirstForField
trans-unit.target: Fout! Voor het veld %1 is het onderschrift getraind! Train het bijschrift eerst.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the field, which should be linked with the source field "%1".
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType SelectTheOffsetField
trans-unit.target: Kies het veld, welke gekoppeld moet zijn met het bronveld "%1".

trans-unit.source: Error during field setup.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType ErrorDuringFieldSetup
trans-unit.target: Fout tijdens het instellen van het veld.

trans-unit.source: Select the field that should be found by the column heading.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType SelectFieldForColumnHeaderSearch
trans-unit.target: Selecteer het veld dat gevonden moet worden bij de koptekst van de kolom.

trans-unit.source: Choose the field whose value should be found by the caption in the current line.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType SelectFieldForCaptionSearch
trans-unit.target: Kies het veld waarvan de waarde in de huidige regel moet gevonden worden op basis van de koptekst.

trans-unit.source: The field "%1" will now be searched via the column heading "%2".
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType FieldIsCapturedByColumnHeading
trans-unit.target: Het veld "%1" zal nu worden doorzocht via de kolom koptekst "%2".

trans-unit.source: The value of field "%1" will now been searched via the caption in the current line.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType FieldIsCapturedByCaption
trans-unit.target: De waarde van veld "%1" zal nu gezocht worden via het bijschrift in de huidige regel.

trans-unit.source: No mandatory field with the option "Required" was found in line %1! Configure a mandatory field first.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType NoRequiredFieldFound
trans-unit.target: Er is geen verplicht veld met de optie "Vereist" gevonden in regel %1! Configureer eerst een verplicht veld.

trans-unit.source: ALR%1 (%2 Build %3)
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType ALRVersionNoText
trans-unit.target: ALR%1 (%2 build %3)

trans-unit.source: There are not fields configured for advanced line recognition, that can be reset.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType NoALRFieldsForReset
trans-unit.target: Er zijn geen velden, geconfigureerd voor geavanceerde lijnherkenning, gevonden die kunnen worden gereset.

trans-unit.source: Line Amount captured (%2) is different from Line Amount calculated (%3) using captured Discount % (%4) to calculate Discount Amount (%5) on line %1.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Purch. - Line Validation - NamedType LineAmountDiffCalcDiscAmtTxt
trans-unit.target: Herkend lijnbedrag (%2) is verschillend van berekend lijnbedrag (%3) met behulp van herkende korting % (%4) om korting (%5) op regel %1 te berekenen.

trans-unit.source: Line Amount captured (%2) is different from Line Amount calculated (%3) using captured Discount Amount (%4) on line %1.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Purch. - Line Validation - NamedType LineAmountDiffCapDiscAmtTxt
trans-unit.target: Herkend lijnbedrag (%2) is verschillend van berekend lijnbedrag (%3) met behulp van herkende korting % (%4) op regel %1.

trans-unit.source: Line Amount captured (%2) is different from Line Amount calculated (%3) on line %1.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Purch. - Line Validation - NamedType LineAmountDiffTxt
trans-unit.target: Herkend lijnbedrag (%2) is anders dan berekend lijnbedrag (%3) op regel %1.

trans-unit.source: WARNING: %1
trans-unit.note: Codeunit Adv. Purch. - Line Validation - NamedType WarningTxt
trans-unit.target: WAARSCHUWING: %1

trans-unit.source: Advanced Line Recognition
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control ALR - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Geavanceerde lijnherkenning

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the field value is to be found. With Standard, the field is searched for using the standard row recognition.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Advanced Line Recognition Type - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u aan hoe de waarde van het veld wordt gevonden. Met standaardwaarde wordt het veld gezocht naar het gebruik van de standaard lijnherkenning.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of the sequence in which the field is processed.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Sorting - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de positie van de volgorde waarin het veld wordt verwerkt.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the source field used to calculate the field value via distances/offsets.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Anchor Field - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Geeft het bronveld in dat gebruikt wordt om de waarde van het veld te bepalen via afstanden/offsets.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the searched field is searched above or below the line in which the values of the standard line recognition were found.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Field Position - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Geeft aan of het zoekveld boven of onder de regel wordt gezocht waarin de waarden van de standaardregelherkenning werden gevonden.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the line field whose content will be used as value if the value of the current field cannot be found.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Substitution Field - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Geeft het regelveld aan waarvan de inhoud als waarde wordt gebruikt indien de waarde van het huidige veld niet kan worden gevonden.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the current field is not found, the value is copied to the current line from the same field from the previous line.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Get Value from Previous Value - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Als de waarde van dit veld niet wordt gevonden op de huidige regel, wordt de waarde overgenomen van de vorige regel.

trans-unit.source: Offsets
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Offsets - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Verschuivingen

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the top.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Offset Top - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de bovenkant.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the bottom.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Offset Bottom - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de onderkant.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the left.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Offset Left - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de linkerkant.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the right.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control Offset Right - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de rechterkant.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the search text/caption on the X axis.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control ALR Value Caption Offset X - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Specificeert de afstand naar de zoektekst/bijschrift op de X-as.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the search text/caption on the Y axis.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control ALR Value Caption Offset Y - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de zoektekst/bijschrift op de X-as.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the expected field width of the field.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Temp. Field Card Ext. - Control ALR Typical Value Field Width - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Specificeert de verwachte veldbreedte.

trans-unit.source: Adv. line recognition
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action AdvancedLineRecognition - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Geavanceerde lijnherkenning

trans-unit.source: Find value by linked field
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action SearchByLinkedField - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Vind waarde via gekoppeld veld

trans-unit.source: The desired field is found via a fixed offset (distance) from another field.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action SearchByLinkedField - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Het gewenste veld wordt gevonden via een vaste offset (afstand) uit een ander veld.

trans-unit.source: Find value by column heading
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action SearchByColumnHeading - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Vind waarde via kolomkoptekst

trans-unit.source: The desired field is searched for using a previously trained column heading in the range of the current position.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action SearchByColumnHeading - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Het gewenste veld wordt gezocht via een eerder getrainde kolomkop binnen het bereik van de huidige positie.

trans-unit.source: Find value by caption
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action SearchByCaption - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Vind waarde via bijschrift

trans-unit.source: The desired field is searched for using a previously trained search text/caption in the area of the current position.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action SearchByCaption - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Het gewenste veld wordt gezocht via een eerder getrainde zoektekst/bijschrift in het gebied van de huidige positie.

trans-unit.source: Reset field
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action ResetFieldToDefault - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Veld opnieuw instellen

trans-unit.source: The advanced line recognition settings are reset for the desired field.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action ResetFieldToDefault - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: De geavanceerde lijnherkenning instellingen voor het gewenste veld zijn gereset.

trans-unit.source: Version
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action ShowVersionNo - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Versie

trans-unit.source: Displays the currently used version of the advanced line detection.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Doc Lines ListPart Ext. - Action ShowVersionNo - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Toont de momenteel gebruikte versie van de geavanceerde lijnherkenning.

trans-unit.source: You are using version %1 of the advanced line recognition.
trans-unit.note: Displays the current version of the Advanced line recognition to the user including the build
Codeunit Adv. Line Recognition Mgt. - NamedType YouAreUsingALRVersion
trans-unit.target: U gebruikt versie %1 van de geavanceerde regelherkenning.

trans-unit.source: Substitution Field
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Substitution Field - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Vervangingsveld

trans-unit.source: Anchor Field
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Anchor Field - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Ankerveld

trans-unit.source: Sorting
trans-unit.note: Position in the sort order in which the field will be processed
TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Sorting - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Sorteren

trans-unit.source: Field position
trans-unit.note: Defines if the field is above or below the standard line fields
TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Field Position - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Veld positie

trans-unit.source: ,Above standard line,Below standard line
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Field Position - Property OptionCaption
trans-unit.target: ,boven de standaard lijn, onder de standaard lijn

trans-unit.source: Copy value from previous value
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Get Value from Previous Value - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Kopieer waarde van de vorige lijn

trans-unit.source: Advanced Line Recognition Type
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Advanced Line Recognition Type - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Geavanceerde lijnherkenningstype

trans-unit.source: Standard,Anchor linked field,Field search with caption,Field search with column heading,Group value with caption
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Advanced Line Recognition Type - Property OptionCaption
trans-unit.target: standaard,anker gekoppeld veld,veld zoeken met bijschrift,veld zoeken met kolomhoofding, groepwaarde met bijschrift

trans-unit.source: Offset Top
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Offset Top - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset bovenkant

trans-unit.source: Offset Height
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Offset Bottom - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset hoogte

trans-unit.source: Offset Left
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Offset Left - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset linkerkant

trans-unit.source: Offset Width
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field Offset Right - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset breedte

trans-unit.source: Caption Offset X
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field ALR Value Caption Offset X - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset bijschrift X

trans-unit.source: Caption Offset Y
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field ALR Value Caption Offset Y - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset bijschrift Y

trans-unit.source: Field Width
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field Extension - Field ALR Typical Value Field Width - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Veldbreedte
